Attilla/Luzbel/3 bat probes::

Atilla and Luzbel left the water and changing to robot mode, they 
turning on their jetpack, they followed Slayer 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer::
> 
> Multiple shots slam into the damaged side of Slayer's armor, 
sending 
> him flying out of the way of the other shots that were aimed at 
him. 
> He could feel the burning of the melted suit against his skin. 
Slayer 
> sees two shadows above him, knowing they were more bots.
> 
> Activating his jetpack, Slayer erupts from the water. His scanners 
> reported that Prebon was already in the Predacon base. It was too 
> late. Slayer growled, baring his teeth.
> 
> "Let's get out of here. Its too late. Meet me at base and we'll 
plan 
> these bots' demise," he says over the comm to Ignatis as he blasts 
off 
> toward the Trainer base. He would take a different route so that 
the 
> Predacons couldn't follow as easilly, and he would stop at several 
> locations in case they did follow. Those bots would pay for taking 
his 
> master, they would pay dearly...
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Elecktra/Attilla/Luzbel::
> > 
> > The under water cannon shot against Slayer (25 times), Elecktra 
> > appeared in robot mode(She had used other place to leave the 
> base)and 
> > she had in her a sort of staff. She pressed a button and it 
became a 
> > trident, she shot 25 discharges of energy against Slayer.
> > 
> > Attill and Luzbel transformed to beast mode (Two dragons with 
wings)
